content: --पक्षः {1} the northern wing or side. {2} the dark half of a lunar month. {3} the second part of an argument, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} a reply, the reason {%pro%}. (<ab>opp.</ab> पूर्वपक्ष); प्रापयन् पवनव्याधेर्गिरमुत्तरपक्षताम् <ls>Śi. 2. 15.</ls> {4} a demonstrated truth or conclusion {5} the minor proposition in a syllogism. {6} (in <ls>Mīm.</ls>) the fifth member of an {%Adhikaraṇa%} <ab>q. v.</ab>
